basic inverse cdf sampling with qnorm
```{r}
set.seed(12)
m1_u1 = runif(1000)

set.seed(37)
m1_u2 = runif(1000)

m1_x = qnorm(m1_u1)
m1_y = qnorm(m1_u2)

hist(m1_x)
hist(m1_y)
plot(m1_x, m1_y)
```

basic inverse cdf sampling with inverse error function
```{r}
set.seed(9)
m2_u1 = runif(1000)

set.seed(23)
m2_u2 = runif(1000)

erfinv = function (x){
  qnorm((1 + x)/2)/sqrt(2)
} 

m2_x = erfinv(m2_u1)
m2_y = erfinv(m2_u2)

plot(m2_x, m2_y)
hist(m2_x)
hist(m2_y)

```

box-muller transform method
```{r}
set.seed(45)
m3_u1 = runif(1000)

set.seed(63)
m3_u2 = runif(1000)

s = -log(m3_u1)
theta = 2*pi*m3_u2
r = sqrt(2*s)

m3_x = r * cos(theta)
m3_y = r * sin(theta)

hist(m3_x)
hist(m3_y)
plot(m3_x, m3_y)
```


central limit thm method
```{r}
n_points = 1000
n_adds = 1000

set.seed(105)
random_matrix = matrix(runif(n_points * n_adds), nrow = n_adds, ncol = n_points)

gaussians = colSums(random_matrix)

gmean = n_adds / 2
gstd = sqrt(n_adds / 12)
rescaled_gaussians = (gaussians - gmean) / gstd

hist(rescaled_gaussians, nclass = 50)
plot(rescaled_gaussians)

##test commit
```
